sentence.Network_en: They feel scared and powerless in conveyor-belt hospital wards.
sentence.Network_cn: 在千篇一律的病房里，他们感到恐惧而又无能为力。

sentence.Network_en: Despite its lack of formal power the nobility was not powerless.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管没有正式的权力，贵族阶层并非没有权势。

sentence.Network_en: If you don't have money, you're powerless.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你没有钱，就寸步难行。

encyclopedia.content: 百科名片 Linkin Park第五张录音室专辑《Living Things》锛堉形囊朊荷そぴ泔級的第十二首也是最后一首歌曲。 歌曲：Powerless 演唱：Linkin Park 专辑：Living Things锛堉形囊朊荷そぴ泔級 另外，Powerless还被选为电影《吸血鬼猎人林肯》的主题曲： 蒂姆波顿制片，提莫·贝克曼贝托夫执导的哥特风电影《吸血鬼猎人林肯》。 鬼才导演蒂姆-波顿担任制片新片《亚伯拉罕-林肯：吸血鬼猎人》的原声mv——来自

entry.def: Someone who is powerless is unable to control or influence events.

example.ex: If you don't have money, you're powerless.
example.tran: 如果你没有钱，就寸步难行。

example.ex: ...political and economic systems that keep women poor and powerless.
example.tran: 致使女性一直贫穷且没有权力的政治经济体系

entry.def: If you are powerless to do something, you are completely unable to do it.

example.ex: People are being murdered every day and I am powerless to stop it...
example.tran: 每天都有人被杀，而我却无力阻止。

example.ex: He was sympathetic, but powerless to help.
example.tran: 他表示同情，但爱莫能助。

auth_sentence.content: Our government appears powerless to rein in these people.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our government appears powerless to rein in these people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our government appears powerless to rein in these people.

auth_sentence.content: Democratically elected governments appear powerless to turn things around.
auth_sentence.res_content: Democratically elected governments appear powerless to turn things around.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Democratically elected governments appear powerless to turn things around.

auth_sentence.content: We are not powerless, and we are not peons.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are not powerless, and we are not peons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are not powerless, and we are not peons.

sentences.en: If he took control, they would be rendered virtually powerless.
sentences.cn: 如果由他来掌管，他们实际上就会丧失所有的权力。

sentences.en: They were completely powerless against such a large group.
sentences.cn: 他们完全没有能力对抗一个这么大的组织。
